summary: A grieving husband tries to uncover the truth behind his wife's suicide, leading him to discover a tragic tale of infidelity and redemption.
cast: Marianne Hoppe|Paul Dahlke|Ferdinand Marian|Siegfried Breuer|Elisabeth Flickenschildt|Karl Günther|Eric Helgar|Karl Platen|Anja Elkoff|Walter Lieck|Ernst Legal|Hans Stiebner|Hugo Flink|Klaus Pohl|Leo Peukert|Maria Loja|Ethel Reschke|Karl Etlinger|Ernst Rotmund|Walter Bechmann|Hans Parge|Hansi Schuendler|Rudolf Kalvius|Herbert Weissbach|Egon Vogel|Hanns Waschatko|Helmut Käutner|Karl Junge-Swinburne|Hermann Noack|Elisabeth von Ruets
title: Romanze in Moll
